titleStmt.title: The farmers catechize, or A religious parly between the father and the son Being a profitable and pleasing discourse running thorough the whole scripture, and it is dedicated to all those honest families that desires Christ may dwell in their hearts. Written by William Blake, May 1. 1657.
titleStmt.author: W. B. (William Blake), fl. 1650-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Mr. Butler in Lincolns-Inn-fields; neer the Three-Tun Tavern, by the Market-place,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; lacks leaf B4 and all after D8.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
